fields.label: html
fields.options: ENDORSEMENT TO STANDARD DOMESTIC COVER

fields.label: html1
fields.options: The following Definitions and Proviso's in the Standard Domestic Cover wording shall be amended to read as follows:

fields.label: html3
fields.options: An "𝐈𝐧𝐬𝐮𝐫𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐬𝐚𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧" means any goods delivered or services rendered by the Insured to a buyer, after the inception date of the policy, on credit terms not exceeding 180 days and excluding any goods my goods delivered on consignment, cash sales or cash payments by a negotiable instrument.

fields.label: html5
fields.options: A. The Insured shall declare to BECI, in respect of each Insured Buyer individually on the forms provided by BECI for this purpose, the grass invoice value of all insurable Transactions in respect of each insured Buyer as follows:

fields.label: HTML6
fields.options: i. Concluded for each month form the inception date of the policy or the effective date of the annual policy review with each insured customer.

fields.label: html7
fields.options: ii. The gross invoice value shall include anu insurance, freight or other charges payable by the insured on behalf of Insured Buyer but shall exclude VAT.

fields.label: html8
fields.options: A. The declarations shall be sent by the Insured in order to reach BECI with in 14 days after the end of each month from the Inception Date of the policy or from the effective date of the annual policy renewal.

fields.label: html9
fields.options: B. The Insured shall also be declare to BECI, in respect of each Insured Buyer individually, on the forms provided by BECI for this purpose, the Insured Debit that is 30 days or more overdue for payment by the Insured Buyer. The declaration must reach BECI with in 14 days after the end of the each calendar month.

fields.label: html11
fields.options: The minimum premium shown in Section 6(a) of the schedule shall be paid by the Insured to BECI before the issue of the policy and shall be applied in reduction of premiums payable. Once the minimum premium has been liquidated, any additional premium.

fields.label: html11
fields.options: A. Payable shall be settled by the Insured up on the receipt of BECI statement.

fields.label: html12
fields.options: B. The minimum monthly premium shall be the product of monthly gross turnover (gross invoice value ) and the relevant premium rate shown in Section 6(b) of the schedule

fields.label: html13
fields.options: C. The premium shall be paid by the Insured to BECI on the presentation of the invoice raised on the basis of (A) above.

fields.label: html14
fields.options: In addition, the Insured shall pay a monthly fee as specified in Section 6(c) of the schedule for each Credit Limit in force at the end of each month.
